title: Putin Manipulated Donald Trump's Ego And Insecurities, Claims New Book
content: In his upcoming memoir retired US Army Lieutenant General Herbert Raymond McMaster alleges that Russian President Vladimir Putin manipulated former President Donald Trump by exploiting his ego.
summary: In his upcoming memoir retired US Army Lieutenant General Herbert Raymond McMaster alleges that Russian President Vladimir Putin manipulated former President Donald Trump by exploiting his ego.

title: PM Modi To Visit Ukraine, Poland PM Talks Of Indias Role In Resolving War
content: PM Modi Ukraine Visit: A day ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's much-anticipated visit to conflict-hit Ukraine, Poland Prime Minister Donald Tusk said India could play an essential and constructive role in resolving the Russia-Ukraine war.
summary: PM Modi Ukraine Visit: A day ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi's much-anticipated visit to conflict-hit Ukraine, Poland Prime Minister Donald Tusk said India could play an essential and constructive role in resolving the Russia-Ukraine war.

title: Asia's 1st Known Case Of New Deadlier Mpox Strain Confirmed In Thailand
content: Asia's first known case of a new, deadlier Mpox virus strain has been confirmed in Thailand. The patient who has been tested positive for the new strain landed in Bangkok on August 14.
summary: Asia's first known case of a new, deadlier Mpox virus strain has been confirmed in Thailand. The patient who has been tested positive for the new strain landed in Bangkok on August 14.

title: Tim Walz's Flannel Fashion Sense Wins Praise From Barack Obama
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz may not have been present at the Democratic National Convention on Tuesday evening, but his fashion sense was certainly felt.
summary: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz may not have been present at the Democratic National Convention on Tuesday evening, but his fashion sense was certainly felt.

title: Opinion: Modi In Ukraine: Playing 'Mediator' May Not Be Feasible For India
content: The issue is whether it is opportune to reach out to Central and East European countries at this moment when both Ukraine and Poland are locked up in a military confrontation with Russia as front-line states with US and NATO support.
summary: The issue is whether it is opportune to reach out to Central and East European countries at this moment when both Ukraine and Poland are locked up in a military confrontation with Russia as front-line states with US and NATO support.

title: Actor Mindy Kaling Endorses Kamala Harris, Shares Heartfelt Story
content: On the third night of the Democratic National Convention, actress and producer Mindy Kaling captivated the audience with her heartfelt support for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign.
summary: On the third night of the Democratic National Convention, actress and producer Mindy Kaling captivated the audience with her heartfelt support for Kamala Harris' presidential campaign.

title: PM Modi Meets Polish Counterpart Donald Tusk, Discusses Bilateral Ties
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met his Polish counterpart Donald Tusk and discussed ways to strengthen bilateral ties.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today met his Polish counterpart Donald Tusk and discussed ways to strengthen bilateral ties.

title: NDTV Ground Report: Human Cost Of The Unending Russia-Ukraine War
content: The Russia-Ukraine conflict rages on, entering its 31st month, with no end in sight. The battle for Bakhmut, a crucial Ukrainian city, has been one of the most intense, leaving destruction and devastation in its wake on both sides.
summary: The Russia-Ukraine conflict rages on, entering its 31st month, with no end in sight. The battle for Bakhmut, a crucial Ukrainian city, has been one of the most intense, leaving destruction and devastation in its wake on both sides.

title: 5 Bodies Recovered In UK Tycoon Shipwreck, Divers Seek Last Missing Person
content: Searches resumed Thursday for the last person missing after a superyacht carrying UK tech tycoon Mike Lynch sank off Sicily, with divers recovering a fifth body from the wreck.
summary: Searches resumed Thursday for the last person missing after a superyacht carrying UK tech tycoon Mike Lynch sank off Sicily, with divers recovering a fifth body from the wreck.

title: Texas Gets A Landmark - A 90-Foot-Tall Hanuman Murti, Tallest Outside India
content: A 90-foot-tall bronze murti of Lord Hanuman, unveiled near Houston, symbolising "a new milestone in the cultural and spiritual landscape of America," has become the latest landmark in Texas visible from miles away.
summary: A 90-foot-tall bronze murti of Lord Hanuman, unveiled near Houston, symbolising "a new milestone in the cultural and spiritual landscape of America," has become the latest landmark in Texas visible from miles away.

title: Taylor Swift Did Not Make It To Democrat Event, But Her Songs Did
content: Taylor Swift may have been absent from the Democratic National Convention (DNC), but her presence was still felt through her music.
summary: Taylor Swift may have been absent from the Democratic National Convention (DNC), but her presence was still felt through her music.

title: 'Nostradamus' Of US Polls Says Robert Kennedy Jr's Exit Will Help Harris
content: The historian will make the official prediction for the 2024 White House race after the Democratic convention.
summary: The historian will make the official prediction for the 2024 White House race after the Democratic convention.

title: Choose Leader Who Values 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam': Hindu Priest To Democrats
content: On the third day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, the chants of "Om Shanti, Shanti" echoed in the hall and the priest conducting the prayers urged Americans to choose a leader who believes in the concept of 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam'.
summary: On the third day of the Democratic National Convention in Chicago, the chants of "Om Shanti, Shanti" echoed in the hall and the priest conducting the prayers urged Americans to choose a leader who believes in the concept of 'Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam'.

title: Gunmen Open Fire On School Van In Pakistan, 2 Children Killed
content: Gunmen opened fire on a school van in Pakistan's Punjab province on Thursday, killing two children and wounding five other people.
summary: Gunmen opened fire on a school van in Pakistan's Punjab province on Thursday, killing two children and wounding five other people.

title: OpenAI Says California's Controversial AI Bill Will Hurt Innovation
content: SB 1047, introduced by Wiener, aims to enact what his office has called "common sense safety standards" for companies that make large AI models above a specific size and cost threshold.
summary: SB 1047, introduced by Wiener, aims to enact what his office has called "common sense safety standards" for companies that make large AI models above a specific size and cost threshold.

title: World's Most Haunted Doll Has Attacked 17 Men, Claims Its Owner
content: It may look like any other ordinary doll but it's not. It has gained notoriety for all the wrong reasons. Meet the world's "most haunted doll", reportedly possessed by the spirit of a jilted bride -- Elizabeth.
summary: It may look like any other ordinary doll but it's not. It has gained notoriety for all the wrong reasons. Meet the world's "most haunted doll", reportedly possessed by the spirit of a jilted bride -- Elizabeth.

title: Tim Walz's Son, Who Has Learning Disorder, Star At Democrat Event
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz's son, Gus, stole the spotlight today as his father accepted the vice presidential nomination at the Democratic National Convention in Chicago.

title: Robert Kennedy Jr To Quit US Presidential Race, Will Support Trump: Report
content: Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is expected to drop out of the race for the White House, US media reported on Wednesday, with the independent candidate due to make a major address later in the week.
summary: Presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is expected to drop out of the race for the White House, US media reported on Wednesday, with the independent candidate due to make a major address later in the week.

title: "Our Party Acts Like A Cult": Anti-Trump Republicans At Democrat Event
content: While Democratic luminaries including the Obamas enthusiastically support Kamala Harris for US president at their party's convention, an unlikely band of rebels is joining the effort: Republicans urging fellow conservatives to ditch Donald Trump.
summary: While Democratic luminaries including the Obamas enthusiastically support Kamala Harris for US president at their party's convention, an unlikely band of rebels is joining the effort: Republicans urging fellow conservatives to ditch Donald Trump.

title: Democratic Convention's TV Ratings Beat Donald Trump-Led Republican Event
content: DNC's maiden night averaged 20 million viewers across 13 networks on Monday, comfortably surpassing the audience for the first three days of the RNC held last month in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
summary: DNC's maiden night averaged 20 million viewers across 13 networks on Monday, comfortably surpassing the audience for the first three days of the RNC held last month in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
